name: Thim Elementor Kit
author: ThimPress

sections.description:
Thim Elementor Kit is a great choice for people who want to create a beautiful and professional WordPress website with Elementor Page Builder. This plugin gives you everything you need to create your own website, even if you have no web design experience. Thim Elementor Kit is the perfect solution for you, with powerful features that will make you love this plugin instantly.

Especially for Eduma or other LMS WordPress Themes users, Thim Kit has ThimPress Extension Widgets that allow you to edit and customize courses. Each icon, each title, and many other things will now be made following your own style. We focus on the ease-of-use, which is why Drag & Drop Builder is also compatible with Thim Kit and you can choose what you want from our already-built templates and widgets. For LearnPress – LMS WordPress Plugin users, Thim Kit fits all the purposes of creating and editing courses. Powerful as Elementor but free, Thim Kit is the best choice for your website, especially your LMS website.

What themes are best for Thim Kit?

Eduma – #1 Education WordPress Theme
Coaching – Perfect solution for Coaching WordPress Theme
Course Builder – Build & Sell your online courses easily.
EduPress – Free Education Theme using Thim Kit.

Key Features

  1. LearnPress Course Editor.
  2. Header and Footer Editor.
  3. Mega Menu Editor.
  4. Blog and Single Post Editor.
  5. Shop and Single Product Editor.
  6. 40+ Free Widgets.
  7. Good response on any device.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugin > Add new’.
2. Search for thim elementor kit.
3. Activate LearnPress from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org
1. Search, select and download thim-elementor-kit.
2. Upload the thim-elementor-kit folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or alternatively upload the thim-elementor-kit.zip file via the plugin page of WordPress by clicking ‘Add New’ and selecting the zip from your computer.

short_description: Thim Elementor Kit is a plugin which supports users to build theme, layout, page, post, product, Woocommerce, LearnPress, courses with Elementor.
